items.sentence: Tom has a tendency to get a little worked up.
You should learn to keep your anger in check.
You can\'t teach a crab how to walk straight.
Tom prayed that his mother would forgive him.
Tom struck up a conversation with a stranger.
I wish I had known what you were looking for.
I wish Tom were here right now instead of me.
I wish Tom would stop screaming all the time.
I never should\'ve let Tom eat so much candy.
I never thought I\'d see Tom in Boston again.
I think it\'s too early to go over to Tom\'s.
I can\'t belive that you called Tom an idiot.
I can\'t figure out how to get this box open.
The man at the door didn\'t tell me his name.
The movie Tom was watching wasn\'t in French.
There is an urgent need for medical supplies.
In 1964, Rev. King won the Nobel Peace Prize.
Don\'t you think you\'ll get married someday?
Do you know those ladies getting off the bus?
Tom knocked on the door, but no one answered.
Tom wasn\'t sure who he was supposed to meet.
What\'s wrong with painting the ceiling blue?
What\'s your favorite movie with a car chase?
Tom always wants to do everything by himself.
The escaped prisoner hasn\'t yet been caught.
She explained to him how to solve the puzzle.
You can\'t buy anything if you have no money.
You don\'t know how to drive as well as I do.
You don\'t want to get married either, right?
You haven\'t seen Tom this morning, have you?
Have you ever seen anything like this before?
Tom usually takes a short snooze after lunch.
Tom wanted Mary to bring him a cup of coffee.
I wish that I had gone to Australia with Tom.
Do you think that money really matters to me?
Do you want me to ask Tom to do that for you?
Do you want to know what I think is going on?

We want to get out of here as soon as we can.
Doing that likely won\'t be very interesting.
I fell in love with her the moment I met her.
I find myself thinking about you quite often.
Tom\'s father doesn\'t let Tom drive his car.
I want Tom to understand why he has to leave.

During happy hour, all drinks are half price.
I accepted the offer after due consideration.
I agree with almost everything Tom just said.
